website_summaries.verdict: Excellent curved TV that comes at a surprisingly low price for an updated 65-inch model.
pros: Lots of bells and whistles for a decent price, including a large 65-inch screen, slim design, HDR, 4K technology, and immersive viewing angles
cons: This curved TV doesn't have QLED technology, but for the price, you may not mind

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding TV for the money
customer_reviews.text: This TV was an early Christmas present. It's about as big as the room allows, and because the TV sits in a corner location, the curve looks nice. That shape serves no purpose beyond the aesthetic, but it definitely works for a corner position. In all other regards, the TV is perfect for my needs. The picture is sharp and clear, the built-in speakers are surprisingly good, and I found the remote and menu system intuitive and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very nice TV. Doesn't lose screen visibility if you are sitting off to the side like other curved TVs. Great picture quality
customer_reviews.author: jeno

customer_reviews.title: Love this tv!
customer_reviews.text: This tv is AMAZING! The picture quality on it for movies and video games is incredible! You can see so much detail! We have 2 other much smaller tvs that don't even compare to this one as far as quality goes. And it has a lot of setting options for screen sizing and brightness. Also comes with the apps Amazon, Hulu, Netflix, Spotify, etc. already installed. We are very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading response time. TV is NOT 120Hz
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV as an upgrade to my existing 65" 4k set. The unit I had before only had a 50Hz refresh rate so it wasn't great for gaming. So I spent the money on this one, as it has an advertized motion rate of 120. Except it doesn't. Samsung is lying about the spec. The native refresh rate of this is 30Hz. It is trash for competative gaming. There isn't anyone to Express this frustration to over at Samsung. None of their tech support seems to know what refresh rate actually means.
customer_reviews.author: nick t

customer_reviews.title: Samsung 65NU7300 CURVED 65" 4K UHD 7 Series...
customer_reviews.text: Great TV also does HDR picture and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Clarity
customer_reviews.text: 65” Samsung Curve set up for a hour now. Delivery was flawless, set up by 2 Amazon delivery men was fast and satisfactory. The TV so far is great! We came from a 45” flat screen and the difference is a thrill. Our living room picture window sits opposite the TV and surprisingly there’s LESS glare than our previous TV, which reflected the blinds like a mirror. This one does not. My husband is color blind and is seeing color on this TV. A miracle lol!!
customer_reviews.author: BarbaraBeeAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grrrrrr8 purchase.  No complaints what-so-ever
customer_reviews.text: We now have 2 of these. The other is a 2016 model. Color is great. The 2016 unit seems to have MORE set up controls for color, etc. The curve is wonderful for viewing from different room locations. Mounted this one in a corner which was a challenge to modify the wall mount to accept the large size. For the price and picture quality, I hope they’ll both last for years into the future.
customer_reviews.author: DES

customer_reviews.title: Another Impressive TV from Samsung!
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd Samsung having bought a 40" that is now on the lanai, the 55" that in now mounted on the wall in our bedroom and now the 65" Curved Samsung that replaced the family room 55"! Each and every one of them continues to impress with IMPRESSIVELY VIVID COLOR and CLARITY that allows us enjoyable viewing no matter where we are within our home!!!
customer_reviews.author: David W Parham

customer_reviews.title: picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Samsung 65'' curved screen the quality picture is no better then the one I had replaced. I want to return , so I shop for another curved screen Samsung 65''
customer_reviews.author: steve couch

customer_reviews.title: Great image - 65" Screen
customer_reviews.text: A lot larger than our previous TV, image is excellent. Only issue is that it has audio out on one HDMI and a digital audio out jack. Our 10 yr old home theater doesn't have either for audio in, just red/white rca plugs. Sound is strong on the TV speakers but later want to have surround sound again...
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Tons of glare. Good picture. Poor sound.
customer_reviews.text: It may be my fault, I was under the impressing that curved TVs had less glare. Exact same placing as my old Samsung 1080P flat screen, at least double the glare. The curve means that it catches lights from more angles. Picture is to be expected, sound is poor. Make sure to have a soundbar.
customer_reviews.author: Jvan

customer_reviews.title: You wanna impress some people get this and flex on 'em
customer_reviews.text: Bang for the buck this TV is great! Look at that cuttlefish in all of its 4k UltraHD glory! LOOK AT IT! First thing I played was Blue Planet! Phillips hue light strips backlighting not included, but it's a pretty dope flex huh? 😜 Go buy you those too you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Henebry

customer_reviews.title: Not the best product
customer_reviews.text: Overall product is nice, doesn't have all the smart capabilities that a curved tv normally has. Didn't have cords needed to connect tv to surround system, no Bluetooth, no voice recognition, all in all big fancy curved tv with the minimal extras.
customer_reviews.author: Mommaof3

customer_reviews.title: BEYOND EXPECTATIONS
customer_reviews.text: While shopping for a new TV in a store a customer approached me and shared how he had recently bought a "Curved TV" and he said it was the best "investment" he had ever made. When browsing "smile.amazon" (purchases go towards the charity of my choice) I was impressed with the choices plus the value of the Samsung Curved 65" TV. The freight company Amazon used was more than expected plus the delivery was 5 days earlier than scheduled! The two gentlemen were totally professional and very knowledgeable and had the unit up-and-running within half-an-hour. This, by far, is the total home viewing experience! I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT TO EVERYONE ! ! !
customer_reviews.author: joynoel

customer_reviews.title: Fulfill your delivery agreement,  ASAP
customer_reviews.text: Need my delivery set up and adjustments as per your pre delivery promise and agreed up. This TV HAS PROBLEMS THAT WE CANNOT FIGURE OUT, I CALLED INTO YOUR CUSTOMER SERVICE AND THEY HAD ME TRY SEVERAL THINGS THAT DID NOT DO ANY GOOD, CONFUSED ME TOTALLY, SERVICE MAN HARD T0 understand or repair or adjustment. NEED ASSISTANCE NOW. KEN SIEI
customer_reviews.author: mary siri

customer_reviews.title: Hardware issue
customer_reviews.text: This TV hangs in my spare office where it might have been used 10 times for conference meetings. I put in a service request and someone was suppose to come out fix the TV last week but by the time they showed up it was "out of warranty". If that's true then i must have missed by window by a day. I'm am hoping Samsung pulls through on this one, but 3 phone calls later it is not looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: BEST TV EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This TV has the most beautiful picture and never a glare on it. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon E. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality wish I could return it. Probably a defective unit.
customer_reviews.text: Image quality is terrible. Rarely use it because it's annoying to watch. Wish I could return it or exchange it. You can see the white lights around the corners . It also looks blurry around the edges. Looks like it's getting worse. Don't know if it was defective. **Update. Samsung replaced the panel but the new one has the same issue. Was told by the tech it's a common issue with these and other Samsung screens. So I guess I'm going to have to live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Juan C. Dorantes

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if you should buy? You should!
customer_reviews.text: A VERY VERY nice TV. Good features, good quality, and I have ZERO cons to add to that statement. The refresh rate, image quality, and features are very good. I upgraded my streaming service to the 4K and am blown away at the visual quality experience. This is worth buying, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Picture is great
customer_reviews.text: This TV looks great, has excellent color and clarity. The curve is not as defined as I thought, works great for our setup on the fire place
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV, bad description
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the "curved" what I recieved was the "flat" Still a great tv... just a bad description. Still happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave E.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV
customer_reviews.text: Everybody that comes over and sees this TV remarks on how great the picture is. It is fantastic when we turn out the lights and have movie night. I'm going to buy another one (whatever the most recent version is) for the other main room in the house. Also the onboard apps (roku, amazon prime, netflix, etc.) all work so easily. The remote is slim and intuitive. Samsung nailed it with this one.
customer_reviews.author: JimfromMichigan

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to replace my old plasma tv and chose this model. I did have tomato some adjustments to the settings in order to get a crisp picture, but I'm very happy with my purchase. I agree with others: the curve enhances the viewing experience.
customer_reviews.author: otowngrl81

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this tv 12 months and 8 days and the screen has gone out. TV was in a man cave and not used much. This is the first and the LAST Samsung I will own. Have 8 other TVs of various brands in the house (ALL OLDER) than this one and this one is the one giving trouble. MY MISTAKE. WON'T DO THAT AGAIN ! Too bad. Was looking at washer/dryers and a refrigerator replacement currently when this happened. Glad I know about Samsung reliability now.
customer_reviews.author: Harrell Perry

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love everything about it! This replaced a 55" Vizio that I used for nine years. Really love the curve and smart tv capabilities!
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Its Krispy and Clear and Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the TV's i've owned, this one stands out the most the best i ever owned and it was worth the money..i have it set it up to where its at the footing of our bed, and its like back in the days at the theater sitting right up front seat screen smack up all in your face, and thats how i like it...lol Samsung really went out on this one...good job... thank you and hope your enjoying yours as much as i am....
customer_reviews.author: Tinoetasi Laulusa

customer_reviews.title: Great TV!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV for a Christmas gift for my hubby two years ago. Still great picture quality and works like new. I thought it’d take a while to get used to the curve, but honestly, you don’t even notice it after a little bit lol! Seriously a great buy, and one that’s worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Shannan Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great price and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous T.V. User friendly. Great price from Beach Camera and super fast delivery. Samsung support is available for any question. Happy shopper.
customer_reviews.author: jules ferrara

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Samsung curved TV. My first was a 55'" model and I really liked the curved screen so I had to have the larger 65"4k model. I use it mostly for movies on an home theater system. The best video that I has watched so for, for color quality is a silly movie called Neal & Nicki free on Amazon prime. The colors are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Gene_S

customer_reviews.title: samsung smart UN65NU7300
customer_reviews.text: good afternoon, I bought this device in your online store, but I want to have more features on the device but I can not give that the samsung conra is not available to access the accessibility available on tv, so I ask you to allow the account to be available and not accentuated as it is, and thus allow me to install programs directly from that device, not needing to use any other device to access the channels, but rather, take all the features of this samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Rui B.

customer_reviews.title: Picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a better picture quality compared to my old Vizio. I am also not a fan of the curve style as it is not easy to see from a side view.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong remote!!!
customer_reviews.text: TV came with 8 series remote and can't set it up. Heading to best buy right now to buy the right remote control. Ughhhh annoying!!!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Tupper

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: I had a smaller tv version of this from a few years ago and paid more money. Totally worth upgrading for less money!!
customer_reviews.author: TCW

customer_reviews.title: High end quality, low end price.
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable picture quality, color and depth. Can't believe it was under a grand!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Jerman

customer_reviews.title: Buy this tv
customer_reviews.text: Love this tv. I am so happy with this purchase. Everything about this tv is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: Ought this TV for athe corner of our family room that has lots of light. The picture is awesome and tv sound is good enough for most of what we do. At 65 inches it fits better than our 55 inch flat tv did.
customer_reviews.author: Jreese

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Put this in the man cave and it’s been awesome since! No issues and crystal clear picture! I especially love watching football and playing games with my Xbox One X on it as the graphics are insanely good! Don’t hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pictures, beautiful tv.
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful set! I got it for my husband’s birthday and he cannot tear himself away from it. Well worth the price. It hangs well on the wall. It is so worth the price! It arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique H.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like it at all, the remote control hardly work in a tiny apartment!!
customer_reviews.author: bahaa

customer_reviews.title: Good pic but the rest is not great.
customer_reviews.text: This TV does not support 5 Ghz wifi. Very slow and I have 100 meg service. The remote is a mess. I will likely be getting rid of it. Dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome television!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best tv I’ve ever viewed!!! The picture is absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.author: DTurnbo

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Everything with tv is great! But even with prime membership you are not getting this in 2 days. Took a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: How can you say anything bad about this tv and price?!?!?
customer_reviews.author: Terry A

customer_reviews.title: Best deal!
customer_reviews.text: Got this about $680 when it's on sale. I'm very satisfied with this TV. Amazon has the best deal once in a while. The picture quality isn't the best in the market since there are higher definition TVs, but this nice looking curved TV is great for the money I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Lee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV
customer_reviews.text: Amazing TV. It does have some glare but not much.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Azeredo

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I actually like the curve on the TV. When I sit next to the TV I can still see the whole screen perfectly. The color is also really vibrant. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R.

customer_reviews.title: The pictures are clear and the sound is good too
customer_reviews.text: is good but I dislike the fact that it doesn't have in-built bluetooth,making me to look for extra device,not good at all.
customer_reviews.author: zubby

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mom after somebody broke in and stole her other tv. Very nice. Excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Have had this tv for less than 2 years and the power board needs to be replaced. This does not bode well for a Samsung product!
customer_reviews.author: JJ88

customer_reviews.title: My regular HD tv has a better picture than this 4K tv.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the picture quality. My regular HD tv has a better picture than this 4K tv. Will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Johns

customer_reviews.title: View from any angle in the room!
customer_reviews.text: I was first very impressed when I first came across this TV, and then I looked at the price. It had me sold! Received it in about 7 business days, easy set up! And so so many apps, it's a winner in my book! More bang for the BUCK!
customer_reviews.author: N/A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing TV great value excellent picture definitely worth the purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Talk shop

customer_reviews.title: Great Tv for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Love this tv! It looks amazing and is much bigger than expected! Can’t go wrong with Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: C.D.

customer_reviews.title: we love this TV
customer_reviews.text: absolutely no complaints! We absolutely love this tv and all of the functions!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Riley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My husband is obsessed with this Tv! Awesome price and love the curve!
customer_reviews.author: RAVEN

customer_reviews.title: Curve picks up glare
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t have a swivel base, so we were limited on how we could turn it. It also greatly increases any glare. Wish I had my flat screen again.
customer_reviews.author: Big Red

customer_reviews.title: special features
customer_reviews.text: just didn't like the fact that it didn't have bluetooth!
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Anaya Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of tv for the dollar!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new tv! I called customer support and they got me up and running in no time! Great quality! Great picture!
customer_reviews.author: anita

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY WITH THIS TV, WORKS JUST FINE
customer_reviews.text: PLUGGED IT SET UP WAS OK, ONLY THING I DIDN'T LIKE TV AUDIO IS ONLY OPTICAL NO RCA
customer_reviews.author: JAMES M SAVOY

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far have been pleased with picture quality, color and tone. Enjoy having streaming channels available at a touch.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita W.

customer_reviews.title: Very lite. . Need to upgrade box to match crisp technology but 1080 box works great in meantime
customer_reviews.text: Loving my 65 curved Samsung. Able to mount up with regular mount.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Murch

customer_reviews.title: Curved TV
customer_reviews.text: After carefully hanging on my wall. I felt regretful for the purchase. It comes out too far and I'm always worried someone's going to bump it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Marchello

customer_reviews.title: Samsung's quality beats all others.
customer_reviews.text: This tv was gift to me from me for my birthday. I am very pleased with it. My tv is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: lauri

customer_reviews.title: CENTER stand
customer_reviews.text: The tv is great but I just wish that it came with CENTER stand instead of legs on each end
customer_reviews.author: ARTL

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture
customer_reviews.text: Got this for someone else as a gift. They love it and are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Langan

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally Nice!
customer_reviews.text: My husband feels as f he is at the theater in our bedroom! Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: It's big!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow it's big! Plenty of features. ARC connects to my receiver and functions perfectly. My 55 inch has smart remote, which I prefer. With this one I'm back to fumbling around for the correct button. I can't seem to get the brightness level where I want but other than that, I love it. I bought the curved model because I have a corner application. Would not recommend if used on a flat wall.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa D. Finn

customer_reviews.title: Samsung UHD tv
customer_reviews.text: Overall performance was very good high UHD resolution and even can see the tv from 9 feet distance.
customer_reviews.author: Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: Had the TV close to a month, love it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Liked pretty much all the features promised. Using at home and loving it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture,easy set up
customer_reviews.text: was up and running quickly, great delivery service and set up
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Meldrum

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have few friends told me it might not be real Samsung
customer_reviews.author: King Dawit

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to unbox, mount and set up. Picture quality is great. Sound is much better than old TV. Will take us months to learn all available on this beautiful TV. Glad I read about WiFi. We have 5g router. In connection, I knew enough to connect to the alternative and it connected with no problem. So far, very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

product_meta.title: Samsung 7 Series UN65NU7300 Smart TV, Curverd 65-Inch 4K UHD, 2018 Model
product_meta.description: Ahead of the curve with the clarity of the Nu7300. Like its Nu7100 flat sibling, it has 4x the resolution of Full HD. Non-4k TV content is upscaled to 4K with an immersive curve. The curve is the clear choice.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Samsung 7 Series UN65NU7300 Smart TV, Curverd 65-Inch 4K UHD, 2018 Model, one TM1240A Control with batteries, One power cable, and User Manual
TV Dimensions: Without Stand – 57.2" W x 33" H x 4.8" D. With Stand – 57.2” W x 36.1" H x 12.3" D. Product Weight: 55.1 lbs. VESA Mount compatibility
Power: Power Supply (V) – AC110-120V 50/60Hz. Typical Power Consumption – 75. Maximum Power Consumption – 180
Enjoy millions of shades of color, fine-tuned to create an incredibly vibrant picture. View stunning high dynamic range content with a TV designed to support HDR10+
With a motion rate of 120, get drawn into the action on a curved screen with a surprisingly slim bezel

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars231 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
